item.title: Will Xen chapter be optimized?
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
Yes, the last chapters of the game will be optimized. It’s up to you to adjust in game settings for acceptable playback on your hardware.

You previously posted
I have very uneven framrate. I just stand and looking at wall and fps moves from 30-60 in 1 second. Is there fix for this or i can disable some not important options.

Here are some things you can change to improve performance on your laptop.
*

  • Make sure your game is not defaulting to the integrated video card.
  • In the Black Mesa options turn off dynamic muzzle flashes and god rays.
  • Decrease the resolution.
  • Turn off Anti-Aliasing, MSAA etc…
  • Try low or medium settings.
  • Turn off or turn down CSM.

credit [BMS] Adam-Bomb
